page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5_delete_group(C master_password ,C group_name )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = The group was deleted. .F. = The group was not deleted.

argument.name: master_password
argument.description: The master password for the database.

argument.name: group_name
argument.description: The name of the group to be deleted.

page.description: Allows the administrator to delete a group from the user/groups (UAF) file.
page.discussion: The A5_DELETE_GROUP() function allows the Administrator to delete a group. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example attempts to delete a nonexistent group.
